messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 4/6/01
messages.msgSnippet: April 6 Star Tribune : Home-schooled students are everywhere but home http://www2.startribune.com/stOnLine/cgi-bin/article?thisStory=83918063 Nice article
messages.messageBody:
April 6
Star Tribune : Home-schooled students are everywhere but home
http://www2.startribune.com/stOnLine/cgi-bin/article?thisStory=83918063
Nice article about homeschooling

Intelligencer Record : What on Earth! Geography bee tests students
http://www.phillyburbs.com/intelligencerrecord/news/news_all/1128733.htm
Kids prepare for the state bee.

April 4
Sun Herald : Buzzing off to the national bee
http://web.sunherald.com:80/content/biloxi/2001/04/05/pageone/3877929_04052001

.htm?template=aprint.htm
An article about the Mississippi state winner.

Odessa American : Home-schooled youngster ready for geology bee
http://www.oaoa.com/news/nw040401f.htm
A homeschooler prepares for the state geography bee. (headline has "geology"
in error)

April 3
Washington Times : Discussions integrate experience, class
http://www.washtimes.com/familytimes/homeschool-20014317109.htm
A homeschooling parent writes about family-based learning

Minor mentions :

April 6
Detroit Free Press : Parents at McMillan promise to oppose shutdown of school
http://www.freep.com/news/education/close6_20010406.htm

April 5
Philadelphia Daily News : Blame shooter, not school
http://dailynews.philly.com:80/content/daily_news/2001/04/05/local/RONN05C.htm
3

Huntsville Times : Policeman fishes teen from ditch
http://www.al.com/news/huntsville/?Apr2001/5-e3737.html

Arkansas Democrat-Gazette : Amateur learning hard knocks of pro tennis tour
http://www.ardemgaz.com:80/today/spt/C3givensfranci5.html

Houston Chronicle : 'Does that mean I won?'
http://www.chron.com/cs/CDA/story.hts/metropolitan/869143

April 4
Michigan Live : Homeschooling family selling log home, very minor mention
http://bc.mlive.com/news/index.ssf?/news/stories/20010404bebayhome.frm


Laura Derrick
National Home Education Network
http://www.nhen.org
